revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LinkSprite |model=Acadia |revision=1 (V3.0) |asin=B017VJ9URG |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=10/2014 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6Q;MCIMX6Q5EYM10AD; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8031 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 2.7V 8-Channel 10-Bit A/D Converter;Microchip;MCP3008;;1;,,, Stereo CODEC w/ Audio Enhancement DSP;Wolfson;WM8962;;1;,,, HDMI Port Protection and Interface;California Micro;CM2020;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2026-1YM;;2;,,, 14 Channel PMIC;Freescale Semiconductor;MMPF0100NPEP;;1;,,, |flags=MicroSD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, Audio out (3.5mm), LVDS, MIPI CSI, IR receiver, Arduino expansion |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08; |stock_os=Linux;3.0.35;Ubuntu 12.04;, |tp_firmware=Android 4.4 |default_user=root |default_pass=linaro }} {{TagLine|LinkSprite Acadia - Embedded Single Board Computer}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-acadia/}}
*[https://www.linksprite.com/wiki/index.php?title=Linksprite_Acadia_3.0 ''LinkSprite Acadia 3.0'' on '''LinkSprite''' Wiki] :''"pcDuino Acadia 1 V3.0" and "www.pcduino.com"'' are silkscreened near the IR receiver.
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/09/23/pcduino-acadia-1-is-a-freescale-i-mx6-quad-development-board-with-arduino-headers/ ''pcDuino Acadia 1 is a Freescale i.MX6 Quad Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/pcduino-acadia-1-sbc-runs-linux-and-android-on-imx6-quad/ ''pcDuino SBC adopts i.MX6 Quad, loads up on storage'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6Q ''Quad'' @1.2GHz Quad-Core :MCIMX6Q6AVT10C (ARM Cortex A9) *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC2000 / GC320 :Video decoding 1080p60 H.264 *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) @533MHz *Storage: SATA, MicroSD (TF) Card *Video Output: LVDS and HDMI *Audio Output: Analog via 3.5mm *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) *Power: 5V/2A barrel plug *Dimensions (L x W): 4.72" x 2.56″
===See also=== :;[http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino/ pcDuinos Models] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino-family/ Family] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino-download/ Download] *[[LinkSprite Arches]] (pcduino8-upper) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-arches/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite Acadia]] (acadia2) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-acadia/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite Canyonlands]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-canyonlands-intel-atom-z3735f-quad-2gb-32gb-wifi-win-8-1-mini-pc/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino Lite]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino-lite/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino Lite WiFi]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino-lite-wifi/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino1]] (v1) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino1/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino2]] (v2) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino2/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3B]] (800) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3 Nano]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3-nano/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino3S]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino3s/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino4 STB]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino4-stb/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino4 Nano]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino4-nano/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino8 STB]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino8-stb/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino8 Uno]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino8-uno/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino9s]] • [http://www.linksprite.com/pcduino9s-industry-grade-rk3288-single-board-computer-with-linux-or-android-with-metal-enclosure/ PPage] *[[LinkSprite pcDuino9 Mini]] (new) • [http://www.linksprite.com/linksprite-pcduino/ PPage]
